website_summaries.verdict: A nice little well-made finger puppet set that gives you a lot of bang for the buck.
pros: All the puppets have hands and feet
A lot of versatility for storytelling
Grips well to your finger on the inside
Cute right out of the bag
cons: These are finger puppets and have limitations because they are not full puppets.The holes are also rather small

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: These are really great quality finger puppets compared to some of the others available. My toddler loves them and so far they are holding up to her frequent use no problem. I can also fit them on my hands too and we can all have fun. My only complaint is that a few of the sea animal puppets don't have deep enough finger holes so they fall of easier than my toddler would like. Overall these are quality made puppets and will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable litter Easter Egg stuffers!
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year-old daughter is all about the surprise eggs and finger families right now. I purchased these to stuff into surprise eggs and she absolutely loves them. Each one fits on her tiny fingers perfectly. A few of the animals were poorly stitched with stuffing coming out at the seams. Aside from that, I think this was a great buy! I recommend with supervision.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Box Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are cuter and smaller than they seem in person verses the picture. The fabric is also really soft. There are very slight imperfections here and there but nothing a kid would notice and for the price we are very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: TheCrustomer

customer_reviews.title: These are so cute!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Most of them fit on my finger fine if not you just need to wiggle it in there. They're really soft, none of them came apart or anything. They're good size, some are pretty big. I didn't need them all for my party bags so i kept a few for me and my son lol.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: cute preschool toy
customer_reviews.text: I got them for preschool birthday goody bags. They are cute, good variety, and reasonably made for price. definitely not as high quality as the more expensive ones you can find in places like museum gift shops (there like $3-5 for each finger puppet) but I think reasonable quality for their price. they are all quite cute. as some other reviews mentioned, some of the finger holes aren't too deep but I don't think that will be an issue for preschoolers. some of the fabric at finger holes is borderline fraying. I would definitely purchase for this purpose again.
customer_reviews.author: EJA

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love Them
customer_reviews.text: During this pandemic at our dental office we can no longer have the prize box for kids to dig through and pick their prize. Purchased these and individually packaged them in baggies. I ask the child what their favorite color is, and then hand them a puppet in that color. (When colors run out, I imagine I will say, do you like green, blue or yellow, etc.). These are very well made and very cute. The kids just love them. Will keep as a prize even when the prize box can return!
customer_reviews.author: L. McManus

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a friends 2 year old daughter. She absolutely loves them! I was worried about the quality after reading some reviews but they were great. They even fit on the fingers of her 6’7” dad which fit was one of the things I saw previous reviewers indicate. Not a problem here. I’m ordering more sets for other littles who like to play and also helps with motor skills. Such a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Megan P.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Great party favors
customer_reviews.text: These are sooooo stinking cute! Bought them as piñata filler for my son’s 4th birthday and everyone loved them. They are soft and have a little elastic inside to grip your finger so they don’t fall off. My friend and I were giggling over the little details on each one as I pulled them out of the package. Like the tiny tuft of “water” coming out of the whale’s head and the teeeny tiny teeth on the shark. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, however the mouse lost his whiskers immediately, insides of most puppets do not have elastic to keep on finger, stitching coming out of the cow, bottom of squid and several others with deficits in sewing and threading coming out of most. Not the best craftsmanship. I bought these for my classroom and they are very disappointing. Will be sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: DENISE

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality. All of the animals are really cute
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality. All of the animals are really cute, but the sea creatures are really hard to get your finger into and most of the animals with stuffing has a hole where the stuffing comes out. Some are also coming apart at the seams. They serve their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Nova Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to put inside my children's plastic Easter eggs that we hide in the yard. I wanted something besides candy since from recent birthdays etc., they've already had WAY too much candy. I found these and thought I would give them a try. I was SO pleasantly surprised by the craftmanship of them. They are well made. They fit into the eggs perfectly because you can scrunch them up and there was such a variety of animals that I just adored them. I'll have to update after Easter to tell you how the kids liked them. So far, I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MamaRun67

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality/poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I only recieved 14 in my package. Some of them were cute but then some were not seen together all that well. Then there was the shark. The material used for the teeth was over an inch long sticking out of its mouth with jagged edges on the end . Longest teeth in the world haha. Just ridiculous. Quality control is not up to par. I sent them back
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. I bought them for my toddler because he loves finger puppets. I was disappointed when I opened the package up. Some of the animals were coming apart. I was going to return them but my son had already seen them and wanted to play with them. Some of the animals fall off your fingers too. The sizing are all different.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Not good
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap, so they won't break the bank, but they are just so, so cheap. They do not stay on your fingers. I think that is the biggest problem, the hole for your finger is not workable. The rest of the puppet is ok, but if you want to do some sort of finger dance with them, they are going to fall off. I am not sure how long these will last, I have just been holding them, I can't put them on my finger, they do not stay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Describe and More
customer_reviews.text: Came early, as described, well made, quality great, I am ordering more after seeing how well these are made, these are great for pinata, the party stuff in general or just for kids to have.I hated I didn't order more when I did cause I loved everything about them, there's so well made the eyes and ears tails are well sewed on not glues. Will bauy again,I highly recommend this seller
customer_reviews.author: EsteeDarla

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: These are cute. Some are useable, some aren’t. They are great to keep and entertain little ones with. I wouldn’t plan on giving as gifts...the quality is ok...but not consistent. Some are perfectly adorbs...some not so much. My granddaughter wasn’t too picky and we had fun with them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Grits & Gumption

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these for some of my kids online English teaching, then used them for my toddler. I think the puppets are good for the price. Faces are pretty simple but you can tell which animal is which. There are several puppets that the hole is definitely too small for anyone older than 11. My pinky could not fit in some of the smaller puppet holes. Overall I was happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Skidmore

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Those are super cute. Most of them do fit on my fingers, some of them don’t, but it’s really for my kids and I know they are happy with them and have smaller fingers. In my original order some of the puppets were missing face parts- eyes or a mouth and some of them weren’t sewn properly but seller send a replacement in no time. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Seams splitting. BUT, they were for goody bags for my son’s birthday party. They served their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fit on finger. Can’t work as puppets.
customer_reviews.text: These look nothing like the picture. They will hardly fit on a quarter of the top of the finger. They do not stay on and do not work as a puppets. And as little soft plushy toys, they are a little too small to be trusted with the baby.
customer_reviews.author: SyrupStrange

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for 2yo
customer_reviews.text: These little critters are so adorable! I was hesitant because of all the negative reviews I saw, but for the price this is pretty amazing. Any child playing with these rest assured will not even notice if the finger hole is loose or not... Lastly I did notice that the cow had an odd nose hole with black string as can be seen in the images above, BUT THIS IS A VERY EASY FIX. You can add another yarn in a different color like I did (pink) or cut it off either way the cow looks cute. My 2yo niece Got these for her birthday last month and she loves to play with them. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Great for Child Sized Fingers
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to put in our Easter eggs as we have a young daughter who doesn't yet eat candy. She loves finger puppets and when we got these the quality is really awesome. The only downside is the finger hole is really short. You have to have child-sized fingers to be able to use these without them flying off.
customer_reviews.author: LNoneya

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with these. The designs are cute, if basic (but appropriate for the price point). However, many are sewn almost shut on the inside, making them unusable as finger puppets. Would not recommend since several can’t be used as intended.
customer_reviews.author: BakerSarah

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but...
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and fit well on little fingers. Of the 20, six needed stitched. The quality control was poor, and we had many whose satin linings hadn't been secured, allowing the inside fluff to come out. I fixed them with some sewing, but I shouldn't have had to do that. We'll see how long the others' stitching lasts.
customer_reviews.author: LSB

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag.
customer_reviews.text: The characters are really soft and cute, but there is no consistency on the finger holes. Some fit nicely, like a sleeve over the finger, but some are just a shallow dip in the puppet that have to balance on the tip of the finger.
customer_reviews.author: JMartinez

customer_reviews.title: Most of them cute.
customer_reviews.text: For this price it really was a great idea. There was a couple of little finger puppets that you couldn’t really tell what they were. I think one of them was a fish... But the other ones were very cute. Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Dont spend more than $3
customer_reviews.text: So I got these on a super sale hence the 4 stars- but these are subpar finger puppets. My daughter wants to know why certain animals have no legs (theyre just blobs) and they dont stay on fingers very well. They look like I paid less than $3 for them. Probably would havd preferred to spend a bit more and have the better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Pruett

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: I like the different puppets some of them are really hard to get on and I found a few that the finger socket is ripped and you feel the stuffing. I bought these for my daughter and she has smaller fingers but some of them are still hard for her to keep on her fingers. They are really soft.
customer_reviews.author: hisomance

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Don't fit on your hands, Fall Apart
customer_reviews.text: These were sewn shut inside so they didn't fit on your fingers. There was zero stretch, and a lot of the details were easily removed creating choking hazards. I do not recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good purchase for the price. I have lightly used these over the past few months and a few of them are beginning to unravel. There are a few “animals” that are unidentifiable in my opinion. I guess you can make them whatever you want?
customer_reviews.author: Christon

customer_reviews.title: Not for adult fingers
customer_reviews.text: We stuffed these in waster eggs. They worked perfectly for that and the kids loved them. They’re cute. My only issue with them is the finger holes are SO tiny. There is some inconsistency because there are a couple I can put my finger in but most I can not.
customer_reviews.author: Minerva

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, kids love them
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty cute. The quality isn't perfect, but you can't expect too much at this price point. The finger holes are a little inconsistent; some fit much better than others and the hole goes deeper. That may be due to each puppet being a different shape and thickness. Overall I would but them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my autistic 10yr old.
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son has Autism and sensory processing disorder. These have held up really well. Not falling apart from constant repetitive use and the material they are made of is pleasant for him. Not scratchy or hard. In my opinion these are a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair falls out and meant for a small Childs’s hand not a kid or an adult..
customer_reviews.text: The puppets are so tiny that they won’t go/stay on an adult (female) hand. The tufts of hair on several of the puppets came out and was immediately headed into the child’s mouth. Ended up unable to use them. Very disappointed ointed as they are cute..
customer_reviews.author: Highdhoe

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but coming apart
customer_reviews.text: I used these to stuff eggs at our egg hunt this year, I’d say they were the biggest hit with the 6 year olds. They are adorable and an awesome addition to dilute the candy consumption however the seems started coming apart after a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and more
customer_reviews.text: These little puppets have been AMAZING for plane rides with our 1.5 year old. They are great for independent play, peer play, and structured play. Love the sea creatures especially!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I am going to start out by saying these finger puppets are adorable. The rabbit and panda only have one arm. The other ones in the pictures you can't get your finger in them the turtle was not finished where you put your finger. The rest of them are great and the kids live them
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Okay for kids but mom is left out
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but the homes are very narrow. They accommodate kids’ hands on, but if you as an adult want to play along with the kids, you’ll have a hard time fitting.
customer_reviews.author: GraceLily

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...
customer_reviews.text: I order these to use in my zoom circle time and ended up returning them. They didnt fit my fingers very well, kept falling off and extra fabric on the inside for some reason...but they were super cute and i do wish they would have worked out....maybe next time 😟
customer_reviews.author: brittany stallings

customer_reviews.title: Some finger holes are very small
customer_reviews.text: Cute figures but some of the finger holes are too small for adult fingers. If you are going to "play" with a child, you need to be able to fit the puppet on an adult finger. (I have small hands/fingers and I had a problem with several puppets.)
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not durable
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute but after the second use with kindergarten students, some began to fall apart and become unstitched. I think for rough kids these won’t hold up but it’s ok for the price. I like that there’s 22 because I have 16-18 students so I have some extras.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Small but perfect for my son!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son wanted puppets to teach his new baby brother animal sounds. This was perfect! They are small but fit his fingers perfectly & he loves putting on little puppet shows! I had a hard time getting them on my fingers but I think if you're getting them for a child they're great!
customer_reviews.author: John & Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This gets the attention of the little ones I work with. I use them to play games, supplement stories, review rules, etc
customer_reviews.author: mstrss9

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: They looked alright in the picture but these are so bad. They're almost too small for my toddler to use and they were so cheaply sewn together that some of them were already falling apart when I opened the package.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Fun for telling stories
customer_reviews.text: The finger holes are really small, but I've stretched ours a little to make them wearable. I would have given them four stars if all of the puppets had thread eyeballs, but about half have little beads which are definite choking hazards for the little one, so these are not used without supervision.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made & Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: All of the sea creature in this package are poor excuses for finger puppets. They are poorly stitched and the finger pocket is merely a slit in the lining, too small for the tiniest of pinkies. The other animals are perfect. But the sea creatures made up half the package and therefore half the cost. Frankly, not worth the $14.99 I spent. I would imagine Oriental Trading has a better version.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck B.

customer_reviews.title: Value but not quality
customer_reviews.text: Craftsmanship not good but there are a lot for the money. Some animals can be repaired but some can’t.
customer_reviews.author: Teri H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and there are a ton of them. I just wish they were a tad larger so I could use them with my kids. I have very thin hands and fingers and still struggle to cram one onto my finger.
customer_reviews.author: DuckJ13

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I use these with my therapy practice! They are so cute! When I have the kiddos choose their character, they have trouble, because they are all so interesting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use these on the airplane!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for traveling with my toddler. They were so perfect. She's not quite two but could figure out how to get them on her fingers. The elastic inside is great for holding those little guys on. Fit little fingers and momma fingers! Super cute animals. These also come in handy at the table at restaurants!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute. My only complaint is that the finger holes are a bit small. Makes it hard for adults to play with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Learning Toy
customer_reviews.text: My littles in my classroom love these! Great for large group while singing songs and acting out emotions.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff white

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but hole too short for fingers
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute. However, they are not very functional. The puppets hardly fit on my fingers and I have slender fingers and don’t have long nails. They feel like they’d fall off so quickly, which is a bit sad. I mean, they’re still usable, just not the best
customer_reviews.author: darcygirl

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable finger puppets. We will use them in our child care classrooms. They would also be a cute Easter egg stuffer for our Easter Egg hunts annually.
customer_reviews.author: Allaboutkids

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and look just like the picture! The only downfall is some of them are hard to get an adult finger into and they dont seem to be made very well. Still, over all very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hopsons

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: The puppets I received appear to be great quality. They’re a very reasonable price for so many puppets. Would definitely recommend for young kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Good road trip fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a long road trip with grandkids, they entertained each other with skits. Helped time to quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Black

customer_reviews.title: Finger toys
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loved it except the finger holes were not that deep
customer_reviews.author: Danny Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fun toy but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: They're cute but cheaply made and started to fall apart somewhat. We packed them in our Operation Christmas child boxes because they were so small and fun. These may last a year or so with frequent use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic toy for Cats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as cat toys because my father in law had brought some of these over for the kids to play with, and my cat ended up loving them more than the kids! So if you have kitties, they will love these.
customer_reviews.author: H.Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Miss animals that I want fixed!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get all my animals and got double of 5 different animals. I want the other five that was in the photo and not double of the animals. I am missing a -shark -whale -duck -cow -bunny And I have a double of -hippos -sea horse -striped animal -frog -panda I want what I ordered please.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: These were great stocking stuffers for the kids, gkids and friends. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: james l linsley

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: They’re so cute but some you can’t quite put your finger into, and there’s one I have no idea what animal it’s supposed to be (my daughter calls it a a bird fish)
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Good variety, low quality sea creatures
customer_reviews.text: Some of these are really weird looking. Most of the sea creatures are difficult to use. But overall it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute 🤩
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!!! Very vibrant colors and very cute animals!!! Exactly as pictured! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Whoopie Pie

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive. Does not kit finger unless you are 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive. Does not kit finger unless you are 2. So hard to finger play with these as an adult with a child. I could glue to popsicle sticks, but that was not the intended purchase.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Only for kids
customer_reviews.text: The finger holes are so small, yes, they're for kids, but adults cannot use them to entertain the child. and they appear rather cheaply made. Cute, but doubt they'll last long.
customer_reviews.author: D. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Not enough finger space.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my preschool class and on some of the fi get puppets more than half of them they can't even put their finger in them. There is not enough finger space for their finger to go in so the puppets keep falling off their fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Gracia

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, good value
customer_reviews.text: Half of these are perfect. Then the other half the holes are weird, and the puppets kinda pop off
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: This was just as expected. They are small finger puppets. They seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: My nieces and nephews were obsessed! A couple arrived in less-than perfect condition (ie. finger pocket too small) but for the price, these puppets were worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kpack

customer_reviews.title: Already falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: They are cute and my son loves them, however, he’s had them for 2 hours and they are already falling apart. The shrimp’s fin fell off right away and now the elephant just lost an eye. Not impressed. Edit to add the duck just lost a wing. It’s been 4 hours since he got them. Down to one star.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but like some other people mentioned, the stitching is terrible and several of them aren't usable because of it. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby B

customer_reviews.title: Daycare kids love these
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for preschoolers and toddlers. A couple of the puppets had frayed edges and not well made and not fun but most were easy to play with.
customer_reviews.author: DSW

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: They are really cute however some of them are missing the elastic that holds it to your finger and some of the fingers holes barely cover your finger nail. Kinda hit or miss. The ones that work are pretty nice though
customer_reviews.author: Smd

customer_reviews.title: Loose Stitching
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute. The stitching is not the best however. I bought them for classroom use. I don't know if I would gift them due to questions with whether they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Freyer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money
customer_reviews.text: My kids love using these during song or story time. They aren’t anything high quality, but are great for the price and suit our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great variety for reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the variety. I bought them thinking an adult would be able to play with the toddler. They are pretty small for adult fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Angela D. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description and poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: My puppets came and it was 20 puppets but it was 2 sets of the same 10 puppets. You could not even fit your fingers in the puppet holes. The sharks teeth were horrible looking. That was as far as I examined before stuffing them back in the bag for return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazmom

customer_reviews.title: Great variety, quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, a great value as well. We bought these as toys for our little chihuahua! She adores them. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: tay

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: They came very quickly, seem to be well made. I haven't used them yet bacause are part of a Christmas gift for my son, but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Janeen A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality intricate detailed finger puppets
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this assortment of animals finger puppets. They are all so detailed. Only animal I didn’t see what’s a rooster. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to place in our Easter eggs. They were fairly cheap, however, you get what you pay for. Some of the animals were falling apart, threads hanging off.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smith

customer_reviews.title: it's fun!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little puppets. A little smaller than I expected, but work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Major Movie Fan

customer_reviews.title: great for little kids
customer_reviews.text: my son liked these but echo the complaints that they do not function very well as finger puppets as you can't fit any fingers into them.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: They’re very cute... at least the ones ...
customer_reviews.text: They’re very cute... at least the ones you can actually get your fingers in to. Some of them barley have a hole, so not even the tip of a finger will fit. Very inconsistent sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Citrus Rays

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made. The fish are designed to fit on your finger so they face forward instead of upward. Good thinking! They are very cute and a good fit for both my 6 year old grandson and for me:)
customer_reviews.author: Toni Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Amazing finger puppets-wish these were available when my children were young - very nice variety- thank you Amazon - I live in a small town -Amazon saves me many miles and much frustration.
customer_reviews.author: LaJoyce Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stuffed finger puppets
customer_reviews.text: Putting these in Jeffery’s loot bags for his bday party.... they are so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey gardner

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We love it!!! Really great for kids! Good quality and really fun!!! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vik Lamtiugov

customer_reviews.title: Animal finger puppets
customer_reviews.text: They are cute! But a few don’t look like the animal they are suppose to be.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Barbin

customer_reviews.title: Decent!
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money with some issues. For example, the octopus only had 6 legs and a few animals were lopsided or otherwise disproportionate. I drew smiles on them to be more alluring to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daddy finger fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old loves these. The finger holes vary in quality. One of the puppets so far has loose stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Riegel

customer_reviews.title: Note like pictures
customer_reviews.text: They are not durable and some I don’t know what they are.
customer_reviews.author: vivi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive these puppets, but the quality was poor. There were several puppets that had frayed stitching or were unstitched. Although there were twenty puppets only 6 were usable.
customer_reviews.author: lena79

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as favors for my daughter’s birthday. Really liked these and impressed on how cute they were. Great price and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AZLife

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: Kids absolutely love them! They use them more as tiny stuffed animals than finger puppets since a lot of the holes are too tight to put their fingers in, but still cute and durable
customer_reviews.author: Amber Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit on the fingers very well. But super cute
customer_reviews.author: chaunte cross

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I ordered this 3 times already:) They are great especially for my 3 month old that doesn’t really care for tummy time.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia P.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Cute enough, but the finger pockets aren’t sewn very consistently. It is hard to get some on even little kid fingers.
customer_reviews.author: WI Cheesehead in WA

product_meta.title: Oiuros 20pcs Different Cartoon Animal Finger Puppets Soft Velvet Dolls Props Toys Easter Basket Stuffers
feature_bullets: 20 pieces of different animal finger puppets. All animal puppets with hands and feet, small and cute.
Material: durable soft velvet cloth. Size: Height: about 7cm; Width: about 3cm.
20 different animals include: hippopotamus, elephant, rabbit, duck, cattle, dog, panda, bear, frog, mouse, Turtles, crabs, seahorses, whale, sharks, dolphins, grouper, starfish, shrimp, octopus

You can tell a lot of stories about the animal finger puppets to your children.Smiling animal finger puppets can certainly bring more fun and imagination to your child's everyday play time activity. These also make cute props for story time and baby shower decorations for girl or boy.
Each puppet hole is snug to secure adults or children's fingers fit. High quality soft velvet texture make these a beautiful and classic plush toy set.
